0.2.3 - 2013/12/25
------------------
* Ignore the paths indicated by the -w and -d arguments when watching for
  changes to the documentation.


0.2.1 - 2013/12/25
------------------
* Catch subprocess PTY reading errors.


0.2.0 - 2013/12/25
------------------
* Explicitly parse sphinx-build arguments for better compatibility.


0.1.0 - 2013/12/25
------------------
* Initial release.
